comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content:
Up to may 16th Juarez was already taken by the insurrectos (Maderistas) but the peace negotiations were still takign place, Díaz resignation hadn´t been signed.  The revolutionary army people were in a standby (Madero threatening if Diaz would not resign, the revolutionists will resume fighting).  The "Tratados de Ciudad Juarez" were signed on June 21rst.
 Dr. Roberto Duarte
